text: 2010 pawahan saha sambhanda pradarshanaya nowambar masayedi priyadarshana liyanage 2010 pawahan saha sambhanda welenda pradarshanaya nowambar masa 5,6 saha 7 yana dinawala bandaranayaka jathyanthara sammanthrana shalawe sirimawo bandaranayaka pradarshana shalawedi athi uthkarshawath andamin pawathwimata rajaya katayuthu yoda athayi karmantha saha wanija niyojya amathya jayarathna herath mahatha pawasiya.
